action.text: SA 4882 (the instructions of the motion to refer) fell when cloture invoked on the motion to concur in the House amendment to S. 1605.
Considered by Senate (Message from the House considered).
Amendment SA 4882 proposed by Senator Schumer. (consideration: CR S9039; text: CR S9039) To add an effective date.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4882 proposed by Senator Schumer.
